title: Co-Parenting Challenges in Blended Families
description:
On today’s show, we hear from:
- A woman who can’t stand co-parenting with her husband’s ex
- A man hoping to rebuild his relationship with his wife after a traumatic season
Then, Delony answers your spicy questions on relationships in a lighting round.
Lyrics of the Day: "Saturday Night's Alright For Fighting" - Elton John 
Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
